content: Universal jig saw blades for metal Bimetal jig saw blades for cutting virtually all common types and thicknesses of metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Cut thick and thin with the same blade – progressively increasing tooth pitch so you can cut all thicknesses with this blade Longer-lasting blades – bimetal jig saw blades cut more and better resist breakage Applications Straight cutting of steel/metal pipes, profiles and sheet For use with all jig saws with a T-shank blade clamp ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Base material: Carbon steel, Metal sheet, Unalloyed steel, Metal Plate Blade features: Universal, Fast cut, Straight cut, Long life Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Base material | Carbon steel, Metal sheet, Unalloyed steel, Metal Plate | Blade features | Universal, Fast cut, Straight cut, Long life | Blade material | BIM Bi-Metal | Teeth per inch | 10-21 | Tooth type | Milled, Side set | Shank | Single lug shank (T-shank) | Tooth pitch | 1.2 -2.6 mm | Toothed section length | 3.03 in | Blade length | 4 in ### ITEMS- 2332314 - Jig saw blade SP 77 (5) metal universal - Package Size 5 pc
